query:
ALTER TABLE oauth_tokens 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS connectionName VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS isActive INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS isPrimary INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS dotloopAccountEmail VARCHAR(320),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS dotloopAccountName VARCHAR(255);

CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS oauth_tokens_primary_idx ON oauth_tokens(userId, isPrimary);

ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS isPrimary INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
